title: Create PRD Executive Summary and Product Positioning Document

requirements: Create 1 comprehensive executive summary document (5-8 pages) synthesizing product vision and market positioning
Document 4 core features: AI scanner, free letter generation, paid mailing service, multi-bureau tracking
Include 3 key stakeholder sections: executive summary, product vision, market analysis
Reference 25 specific decisions from guidance-specification.md decision tracking table
Integrate findings from 3 role analyses: product-manager (6 docs), system-architect (6 docs), data-architect (6 docs)
acceptance: 1 executive summary document created: verify by ls docs/PRD-Executive-Summary.md
4 core features documented with specifications: verify by grep -c '### Feature [1-4]:' docs/PRD-Executive-Summary.md = 4
25 decisions referenced: verify by grep -c 'D-0[0-2][0-9]' docs/PRD-Executive-Summary.md >= 25
3 role analysis integrations documented: verify by grep -c '@.*-manager\|@.*-architect' docs/PRD-Executive-Summary.md >= 3
